description: Shared definitions for the recipe Lexicon, including cooking methods, dietary restrictions, categories, cuisines, attribution types, publication types, and licenses.

attributionTypeOriginal.description: Original recipe created by the author.

attributionTypePerson.description: Recipe shared by a specific person, such as family or friend.

attributionTypePublication.description: Recipe from a published source like a book or magazine.

attributionTypeWebsite.description: Recipe from a website or blog.

attributionTypeShow.description: Recipe from a TV show, streaming content, or video.

attributionTypeProduct.description: Recipe from a product package or label.

categoryAppetizer.description: A small dish served before a main meal.

categoryBeverage.description: Drinkable recipes including both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

categoryBreakfast.description: Dishes typically served in the morning.

categoryBrunch.description: Dishes suitable for late morning/early afternoon meals.

categoryDessert.description: Sweet dishes typically served after a main meal.

categoryDinner.description: Main dishes typically served in the evening.

categoryGarnish.description: Decorative or flavorful additions to other dishes.

categorySalad.description: Cold dishes primarily composed of mixed ingredients.

categorySide.description: Dishes meant to accompany main courses.

categorySnack.description: Small portions meant to be eaten between meals.

categorySoup.description: Liquid food served hot or cold.

cookingMethodAirFrying.description: Cooking food using hot air circulation in an air fryer.

cookingMethodBaking.description: Cooking food by exposing it to dry heat in an oven or similar environment.

cookingMethodBroiling.description: Cooking food directly under high heat.

cookingMethodGrilling.description: Cooking food on a grill or griddle with direct heat.

cookingMethodFrying.description: Cooking food in hot oil or fat.

cookingMethodRoasting.description: Cooking food by exposing it to dry heat with hot air circulating around it.

cookingMethodSauteing.description: Cooking food quickly in a small amount of fat over high heat.

cookingMethodSteaming.description: Cooking food using steam from boiling water.

cookingMethodSlowCooking.description: Cooking food at low temperatures for extended periods.

cookingMethodPressureCooking.description: Cooking food using pressure and steam in a sealed vessel.

cookingMethodNoCook.description: Recipe requires no cooking or heat application.

cuisineAmerican.description: Dishes from United States culinary traditions.

cuisineMiddleEastern.description: Dishes from Middle Eastern culinary traditions.

cuisineSouthern.description: Dishes from Southern United States culinary traditions.

cuisineTexMex.description: Dishes combining Texan and Mexican culinary traditions.

dietLowFat.description: Recipe suitable for diets restricting fat intake.

dietLowCarb.description: Recipe suitable for diets restricting carbohydrate intake.

dietVegetarian.description: Recipe contains no meat or fish but may contain animal products like eggs and dairy.

dietVegan.description: Recipe contains no animal products whatsoever.

dietDiabetic.description: Recipe suitable for diabetic dietary requirements.

dietHalal.description: Recipe complies with Islamic dietary laws.

dietKosher.description: Recipe complies with Jewish dietary laws.

dietPaleo.description: Recipe suitable for paleolithic diet requirements.

dietKeto.description: Recipe suitable for ketogenic diet requirements.

licenseAllRights.description: All rights reserved by the creator.

licensePublicDomain.description: Work dedicated to the public domain.
